ChartBids.CardFooterTextNo: There is no data to display at the moment.

Term.TextP2: This Donation Term aims to regulate the making of donations in the amount of R$10.00 (ten reais) through bids in the specific cryptocurrency indicated by the organization, according to the conditions described here.
Term.TextP4: The participant agrees to make a donation of R$10.00 (ten reais) through a bid using the specified cryptocurrency. The amount will be converted to digital currency at the time of the transaction, respecting the exchange rate in effect at the time of the donation.
Term.TextP6: The resources obtained from the bids made will be distributed as follows:
Term.TextP7: 70% (seventy percent) of the total raised will be allocated to the main objective of the campaign, as established by the organization.
Term.TextP8: 30% (thirty percent) of the total raised will be allocated to administrative and educational costs related to the campaign, including operational costs, development of social projects and educational actions.
Term.TextP10: The participant authorizes the organization to receive donations in cryptocurrency, which will be converted to fiat currency at the time of collection. All transactions will be recorded according to the rules of the platform used to conduct the bidding.
Term.TextP12: In accordance with the Brazilian Civil Code (Law No. 10,406/2002) and the Law of Guidelines and Bases for National Education (Law No. 9,394/1996), the organization undertakes to provide transparent and periodic accounts of the use of the funds raised. All expenditures will be described in detail, ensuring that the allocation of funds complies with the established conditions.
Term.TextP14: The organization is committed to complying with all fiscal, tax and legal obligations, in accordance with Brazilian legislation, especially (Law No. 12,865/2013), which regulates operations with electronic currencies and (Law No. 13,709/2018 General Data Protection Law - LGPD), with regard to the collection and processing of participants' personal data.
Term.TextP15: 7. Cancellation or Changes to the Terms:
Term.TextP16: The organization reserves the right to modify the terms of this document or cancel any bid that does not comply with the established conditions, upon prior notice. If there are any significant changes, the organization will inform participants, ensuring transparency and the right to revoke the donation, if necessary.
Term.TextP18: It is clear that the donation is voluntary, and the participant is under no obligation to make the bid. The donation does not constitute a legal relationship of an employment, corporate, or any other nature that implies remuneration or direct benefit to the donor.
Term.TextP20: The participant declares, for all legal purposes, that they are aware of the voluntary nature of their donation and the allocation of funds as described in this agreement. The organization will not be liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use of cryptocurrencies or any failed payment transactions made by the participant.
Term.TextP22: This agreement comes into effect on the date of signature and is valid for all donations made within the campaign. The jurisdiction of the district of Paulista, Pernambuco, is hereby elected for the resolution of any disputes, with express waiver of any other jurisdiction, however privileged.
Term.TextP23: The parties sign this Agreement, aware of and in agreement with all the conditions established herein.
Term.TextP33: I have read and agree to the Donation Agreement!
